entry.title: Use Colab more efficiently with these hacks

link.title: Use Colab more efficiently with these hacks

entry.summary: Colaboratory, or “Colab” for short, are hosted Jupyter Notebooks by Google, They allow you to write and execute Python code via your browser. It is effortless to spin a Colab since it is directly integrated with your Google account. Colab provides free access to GPUs and TPUs, requires zero-configuration, and makes sharing of code seamless.

entry.title: The curious case of Simpson’s Paradox

link.title: The curious case of Simpson’s Paradox

entry.summary: Statistics rarely offers a single “right”way of doing anything — Charles Wheelan in Naked Statistics
